typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		claimid as integer '000',
		claim_amount as integer '000',
		claim_status as string,
		claim_date as string,
		fn as string,
		lname as string,
		claim_month as integer '000',
		claim_year as integer '000'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceLiveADLSGen2
source(output(
		agreegate_claim_id as integer '000',
		agreegate_claim_amount as integer '000',
		agreegate_claim_month as integer '000',
		agreegate_claim_year as integer '000'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ControlFile
sourceLiveADLSGen2 aggregate(groupBy(claim_year,
		claim_month),
	claim_amount = sum(claim_amount)) ~> AggregateLiveData
AggregateLiveData, ControlFile join(claim_year == agreegate_claim_year
	&& claim_month == agreegate_claim_month,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinLiveDatawithControlFile
ConditionalSplit1@ReconcileSuccess derive(claim_month = claim_month,
		claim_year = claim_year,
		claim_amount = claim_amount,
		agreegate_claim_amount = agreegate_claim_amount,
		agreegate_claim_id = iif(claim_amount==agreegate_claim_amount,'Reconciliation Successful','Reconciliation Failed')) ~> DerivedStatusColumn
JoinLiveDatawithControlFile split(claim_amount==agreegate_claim_amount,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(ReconcileSuccess, ReconcileFailure)
DerivedStatusColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat('Pre_Ingestion_Reconciliation_Result',toString(currentTimestamp()),'.txt'))],
	mapColumn(
		claim_month,
		claim_year,
		claim_amount,
		agreegate_claim_amount,
		Status = agreegate_claim_id
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateReconcileReport
ConditionalSplit1@ReconcileFailure sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Pre_Ingestion_Reconciliation_Failure.txt'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
